Package src.controller

Class MenuManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.controller.MenuManager
  • public class MenuManager
extends java.lang.Object
    MenuManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view class - MenuView and the model classes - MenuItem.

    It can customize the menu.

    Since:
    2022-03-31

      Default constructor for Menu Manager

    • Method Detail

      • addMenuItem

        public static boolean addMenuItem​(java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String description,
                                  double price)
        Adds a new menu item, with details of its name, preparation description and price to the menu
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the menu item to be added
        description - Description of the menu item to be added
        price - Price of the menu item to be added
        Returns:
        true if menu item is added successfully. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be added (Duplicated menu item)

      • updateMenuItem

        public static boolean updateMenuItem​(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     double price)
        Updates an existing menu item, with details of its name, preparation description and price to the menu
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the menu item to be updated
        description - Description of the updated menu item
        price - Price of the updated menu item
        Returns:
        true if menu item is updated successfully. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be updated (menu item not found in database)

      • removeMenuItem

        public static boolean removeMenuItem​(java.lang.String name)
        Removes menu item from the menu
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the menu item to be removed
        Returns:
        true if menu item is removed successfully. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be removed (menu item not found in database)

      • getMenuIdFromName

        public static java.lang.String getMenuIdFromName​(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the menu item id from the specified menu item name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the menu item
        Returns:
        The menu item id if menu item found. Otherwise, "" if menu item not found

      • initializeDummyMenuItems

        public static void initializeDummyMenuItems()
        Initializer for dummy menu items in the hotel.

      • printMenu

        public static void printMenu()
        Prints the menu items in the menu with details of each menu item.
